Write a MODISTools data structure to file

write_subset.Rd

Writes a nested data structure of class MODISTools to file.

write_subset(df = NULL, out_dir = tempdir())

Arguments

df

a nested data structure of class MODISTools
out_dir

output directory where to store data

Value

writes MODISTools data structure to file, retains proper header info.

Examples



# download data
subset = try(get_subset(product = "MOD11A2",
                        lat = 40,
                        lon = -110,
                        band = "LST_Day_1km",
                        start = "2004-01-01",
                        end = "2004-02-31"))

# print data structure
print(summary(df))
#> Error in object[[i]]: object of type 'closure' is not subsettable

# write the phenocamo data file
write_subset(df, out_dir = tempdir())
#> Error in write_subset(df, out_dir = tempdir()): not a MODISTools dataset or no dataset provided
